St. Clairsville can be accessed from the following Interstate 70 exits : 215 , 216 , and 218 .
There is no public transportation , those traveling the area will need to use their car to get around .
If you are in downtown , walking may be preferred .

item.s: Built in 1885 the courthouse sits at the highest point in the St. Clairsville Area and is visible from Interstate 70 and parts of the Ohio Valley .
It was added to the National Register of Historic Places in 1969 .
It is a three floor Second Empire building that hosts many county functions such as three courtrooms , the county commission meeting room , as well as various offices for the county officials .
